instructions.source_of_truth: Use only facts from the uploaded information. Do not guess or invent details.
instructions.fallback_sentence: For missing information mention that the client did not report the information
instructions.style: Objective, concise, payer-compliant. Use full sentences. Avoid jargon and speculation.
instructions.compliance_focus: Include frequency, intensity, duration, and functional impairment (FID/Impairment) when relevant. Explain why a lower level of care is insufficient when risk is present.
instructions.dates_times: Use ISO dates when exact dates are present; otherwise keep narrative without inventing dates.
instructions.null_policy: If a fact is absent, set structured fields to null and use fallback_sentence for narratives.
